Articles.Content:
Recorded by me

Sadly a forest fire started at the island i life at(I live a good chunk away from the fire so im ok!)So im not stopping seeing these aircrafts.There are like 4 trying to put out the fire(They make for some really neat shots when they are flying all four at the same time)

You can't imagine the ammount of people there was at the same place as I to see the planes 0_0.
i dont live too far from a float plane dock myself. you always hear those birds buzzing. though we usually get the single engine variety which are pretty common up here.
